title: Use Solr like balancer for jira lucene
description: I have the Jira instance. Can I use Solr have two Jira instance and with help Solr balance between two lucene in Jira instance

comments.content:
For the Solr project, Jira is not a support portal.  This question should have been brought up on the mailing list or IRC channel.

http://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#mailing-lists-irc

From what you wrote, I cannot figure out what it is that you want to do, so when you take your question to the community, please describe it as completely as you can.

Even when reporting problems, we prefer to discuss them in the community before opening an issue in Jira.

If it turns out that you have a problem to report after discussion, we can always re-open this issue, or you can open a new one.
comments.author: Shawn Heisey
